name: knit + purl washcloth
notes:
materials
our [knit + purl washcloth kit][1] contains everything you’ll need to make a 8 washcloths of your own. it contains...
- 2 of purl soho’s [cotton chirp dk mini bundles][2], 100% peruvian pima cotton. each bundle includes four 58 yard/ 25-gram balls; approximately 55 total yards required per washcloth: approximately 40 yards for the main color and 15 yards for the contrast color.
- us 6 (4mm), 24-inch [circular knitting needles][3]
- a [tapestry needle][4]
- a printed pattern card

note: if you only want to make four washcloths, 1 cotton chirp bundle contains all the yarn you’ll need!

gauge
20 stitches and 35 rows = 4 inches in seed stitch

size
finished dimensions: approximately 6½ x 6½ inches

designed by purl soho designer, [keith foster][5]. see even more of keith’s work [on his website][6]!


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/knit-and-purl-washcloth-kit.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/cotton-chirp-dk-minis.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles.html
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--tapestry_needles.html
  [5]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/keith-foster-for-purl-soho/
  [6]: https://www.kelsongoods.com/
